name: help
description: Show available commands and how to use them

name: notify
description: Toggle notifications on a username in The Bazaar.

options.name: bazaar_username
options.description: The IGN you want to receive updates on (case sensitive)

name: list
description: List which usernames you are receiving notifications for

name: setchannel
description: Set the channel for username notifications

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel to post notifications (defaults to current channel)
